SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. Donald Rumsfeld 's account highlights how high-profile security cooperation complicated US-Uzbek relations, said Sean Roberts , an international relations professor at George Washington University. Prior to 9/11, George Washington was able to engage the country's civil society and scant independent media with modest resources in order to promote long-term opening up in the country, Sean Roberts said.
